sentences.en: A new submarine cable was laid from England to Netherlands.
sentences.cn: 英国至荷兰间铺设了新的海底电缆.

sentences.en: a nuclear submarine
sentences.cn: 核潜艇

sentences.en: A submarine surfaced outside the harbor.
sentences.cn: 潜水艇在港外浮到水面.

sentences.en: Atomic energy powers the submarine.
sentences.cn: 原子能供给该潜艇动力(该潜艇由原子能推动).

sentences.en: Because of the enormous responsibility they hold, it is imperative that submarine commanders are masters of themselves as well as their vessels and crew.
sentences.cn: 由于负有重大责任，潜水艇上的指挥员们不仅要控制住自己而且还要指挥好他们的舰艇和全体船员。

sentences.en: Can you fix a position on the submarine?
sentences.cn: 你能给潜水艇定位 吗 ?

sentences.en: He detected a ship moving down the starboard side of the submarine.
sentences.cn: 他发现有一艘船正在潜艇的右侧航行。

sentences.en: If we could, we would look for an Australian-designed and -built submarine, but of course we would look at options as well.
sentences.cn: 如果可以，我们会采用澳大利亚自主设计和制造的潜水艇，当然我们同样也会考虑其他方案。

sentences.en: In contrast with its surface fleet, Britain's submarine force was relatively small.
sentences.cn: 同其水面舰队相比，英国的潜艇部队规模相对较小。

sentences.en: In fact, this monster is not a narwhal, but a wonderful submarine structure.
sentences.cn: 其实这怪物并非什么独角鲸， 而是一艘构造奇妙的潜水艇。

sentences.en: submarine plant life
sentences.cn: 海生植物

sentences.en: The captain dived his submarine deep to escape from the destroyers.
sentences.cn: 海军上校使他的潜艇深深下潜以逃避驱逐艇。

sentences.en: The captain of the submarine has got this periscope thing.
sentences.cn: 那个潜艇艇长有个类似于潜望镜之类的东西.

sentences.en: The submarine at last emerged.
sentences.cn: 那艘潜艇终于浮出了水面.

sentences.en: The submarine can submerge very quickly.
sentences.cn: 潜艇能非常迅速地潜入水中.

sentences.en: The submarine had had time to submerge before the warship could approach.
sentences.cn: 潜水艇没等军舰靠近就及时潜入水下了。

sentences.en: The submarine lies at a depth of 6,000 feet in the Barents Sea.
sentences.cn: 潜艇位于巴伦支海水下6,000英尺深处。

sentences.en: The submarine rose to the surface.
sentences.cn: 潜艇升到水面上来了.

sentences.en: The submarine signaled for help.
sentences.cn: 潜水艇发出求救的信号.

sentences.en: We were trying to plot the course of the submarine.
sentences.cn: 我们试图标绘出潜艇的航线图。

sentences.en: Within a short time, everything on the submarine was buttoned up.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿, 潜水艇内所有的东西都扣紧了.

words.tran_cn: 能浸入水中的；可潜入水中的
能潜水的；能沉入水中的
潜入水中（submerge的过去分词）；使陷入

phrases.tran_cn: 海底扇；海底陆源沉积扇；海底扇形地
潜入式浇口；潜伏浇口；下浇口

trans.tran_en: growing or used under the sea
a ship, especially a military one, that can stay under water
